creation(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->In a pure and peaceful void, [deity0_name] looked on, and wished for a race of loving beings in [deity0_possessive] own image, and made mankind.

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Pacifism) ->The people spilled blood of others, and looked up at [deity0_name], exclaiming, "We are powerful!" And the [deity0_type] said, "Violence is weakness of the mind. Only those of pure heart will prevail."

intro(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], a tradition began at the [altarRoomLabel] of [deity0_name] where different people would meet together to pray in peace, and this pleased the [deity0_type].
conflict(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->A violent [foeLeader] tried to seize power, and tried to kill many of pure heart.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->[deity0_name]'s truest follower [founderName] stood before the [place_powerCenter], faced [foeLeader_possessive] violent rage, and protected [founder_possesive] brothers and sisters.
victory(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->[founderName] sacrificed [founder_objective]self to pass [founder_possesive] soul to [foeLeader] to save everybody.
setup(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->[founderName] was forced to fight in wars, seeing much despair. One day, [founder_pronoun] threw away his weapon and went to seek the true way.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Pacifism) ->[founderName] preached the peaceful way as the true way to eternal life.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->First, we lived like animals, fighting each other. But then we opened our eyes and saw the suffering.
lesson(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->And we decided to live the true life.
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->For if we want to live happily, we must see that every person is a lovable being.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->When the archotechs appeared they were never concerned for appearances; they showed us that the mind stands above the physical form.
archistFact(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->Archotechs sometimes directly touch human minds, but if our flesh is shrouded like our minds, we will not understand.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->[inTheEnd], they will find those that have risen above mindless violence, and will uplift them.
animistFact(tag=meme_Pacifism) ->Killing another person means killing its spirit, and harming your own spirit.
